sentence.Network_en: Bilberry extract benefits the capillaries in the body to help peripheral circulation.
sentence.Network_cn: 越桔萃取物有益于血丝在身体帮助周边循环.

sentence.Network_en: Spread bilberry jam on your morning toast. Or take a bilberry supplement every morning.
sentence.Network_cn: 在你的吐司里面涂上覆盆子酱, 或每天早晨吃一个覆盆子.

sentence.Network_en: Bilberry moisturizes the eye membrane, enhances blood circulation and helps maintain normal eye pressure.
sentence.Network_cn: 欧越莓滋润眼睛黏膜, 促进眼部血管健康及血液循环,维持正常眼压.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: probably of Scandinavian origin; compare with Danish bøllebær

entry.def: A bilberry is a small, round, dark-blue fruit that grows on bushes in northern Europe.

means.word_mean: 1. erect European blueberry having solitary flowers and blue-black berries
2. erect blueberry of western United States having solitary flowers and somewhat sour berries
3. blue-black berries similar to American blueberries
